articles.description: The International Olympic Committee and the Japanese government last month postponed the Games until July 2021 because of the impact of the coronavirus outbreak.

articles.description: Last week, the International Cricket Council (ICC) had said it was still planning for the tournament according to its October 18 - November 15 schedule even as the COVID-19 pandemic doesn’t seem to stop.
articles.content:
